name: Desert Mission Food Bank
hours_of_operation: Services are free and open to the public. Monday-Thursday 9:00AM - 3:00PM, Friday 9:00AM - 12:00PM We do not provide home delivery or medically tailored meals. Food Bank guests can visit two times per month. Guests must complete registration at Intake and provide photo ID and proof of address (recent mail that shows name and address). After Intake, guests drive their car to the loading zone to receive food. Case managers are invited to pick up food on behalf of their patients/participants. Must provide badge, patient's name, DOB and current address. Food bank guests can also designate a friend/family member to pick up on their behalf. Updated 11/13/2023
eligibility_requirements: Walk-ins served. No referral required. Photo ID and proof of address.
additional_information: Additional Information: Additional services: • Fresh produce and a variety of packaged foods and dry goods. • Emergency Food Box (TEFAP) • Senior Food Box (CSFP) • Infant Emergency Food Box Program • Grab and Go lunches for unhoused guests • Hygiene products (based on availability) • Nutrition education and healthy recipes • Gardening Classes • Snack Pack Program for local schools • Community resource navigation (by appointment)
